desc: Engagement By Adam J. Gil specializes in custom engagement rings, GIA certified diamonds and diamond jewelry. Adam J. Gil offers a personalized diamond concierge service. Design your ideal engagement ring in a stress-free, educational environment. Guaranteed to be an unforgettable experience.

layout.text: Adam J. Gil offers a personalized diamond concierge service.  Design your ideal engagement ring in a stress-free, educational environment.  Guaranteed to be an unforgettable experience.
